sentences.sContent: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.sCn: 我听到一些人说要照顾好我们自己，这样我们才有能力去照顾好别人。 不知道为什么，当我听到这句话的时候，我经常笑我自己。

sentences.sContent: I'm going to take care of this and refund your money.
sentences.sCn: 我会处理这件事，并且退还你的钱。

trans.tranOther: keep (someone or something) safe and provided for
